page.title: 16CARR LANE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: This occupies the site of the former gas works and is the only zone of concentrated{secondary industry}in the area. There are many small workshops in which precision engineering, printing and packaging predominate. { { Express Dairies}have a distribution centre here, receiving bottled milk from Tarvin. The 33 workers include 22 roundsmen, working from 5 am to 3 pm. { { MANWEB Training Centre}trains apprentices as electricians, cable joiners, overhead linesmen, Telecom fitters and meter mechanics. The men, when qualified, work in the area between Southport, Manchester and North Wales.
